title: Mr. and Mrs. Truman at Homecoming Dinner in Independence, Missouri
Scopenote: From left to right: Mrs. Robert Weatherford, Mayor Robert Weatherford, former President Harry S. Truman and Mrs. Bess Wallace Truman at a homecoming dinner given for them at the Laurel Club dining room at the Reorganized Latter Day Saints Auditorium in Independence, Missouri.  Photo is copied from original slide number SL2421.  Donor: Mrs. James Schuette.

title: Truman Library Ground Breaking Ceremonies
Scopenote: Unidentified photographers take pictures of former President Harry S. Truman during the ground breaking ceremonies for the Harry S. Truman Library.

title: Truman Library Ground Breaking Ceremonies
Scopenote: Former President Harry S. Truman (center) with president of Truman Library, Inc., Basil O'Connor (second from left) and Tom Evans (second from right) at the ground breaking ceremonies for the Harry S. Truman Library.  All others unidentified.

title: Truman Library Ground Breaking Ceremonies
Scopenote: From left to right, former President Harry S. Truman, Mrs. Bess W. Truman, Margaret Truman, and Mary Jane Truman sit on the stand prior to the ground breaking ceremonies for the Harry S. Truman Library.  All others unidentified.

title: Mrs. Truman Leaving her Daughter's Wedding
Scopenote: Mrs. Bess Wallace Truman exiting Trinity Episcopal Church in Independence, Missouri, after her daughter Margaret's wedding.  This photo copied from original slide number SL 2450.  Donor: Mrs. James Schuette.  She purchased the slides at a garage sale.  Possibly taken by Mrs. Pete Bedsaul of Independence, Missouri.
